name: Hydro Hypostasis
desc:
Code Name: He. A high-purity Hydro entity.
Hypostases have strong rejection properties, and will mercilessly expel any that test them.
Its rejection behavior even extends to natural elements.

customize.text: Protects itself with a cubical shell that is elementally inert. Attacks are only effective when its <color=#ffe14b>elemental core</color> is exposed. When HP is low, it splits into three crystalline "water droplets" that will move towards its core. <color=#ffe14b>Destroy these water droplets</color> in time to prevent the revival of the Hydro Hypostasis.

<color=#ffd780>Dry Clean</color>
Defeat the Hydro Hypostasis without destroying a single one of its Water Droplets (except when it is restoring HP.)

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Bio-Oceanic Weapon</color>
Be hit by a certain animal created by the Hydro Hypostasis...

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Salt for My Foes, and Water for Me</color>
Obtain at least three healing orbs fired from the "water droplets" during the Hydro Hypostasis fight.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>The Fraught Return</color>
Stop the Hydro Hypostasis from reviving itself without destroying any of the "water droplets" by placing obstacles or repelling them.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Dew of Repudiation
dropMaterial.desc:
A strange water droplet left behind by the collapse of the Hydro Hypostasis.
It has strong rejection properties, and this forms the basis of one of the Hydro Hypostasis' attack patterns as well. They say that water contains memories and willpower, and that these things can grow when bodies of water meld together. However, the waves conjured by the Hydro Hypostasis are incompatible with the currents that flow above and below ground. Even if it were to flow into the surpassingly pure waters of Petrichor, this drop of water will likely resist assimilation as strongly as mercury.

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods..."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods... Only laws and the Tribunal can judge someone.
They can judge even me. So praise my magnificence and purity."
